intro.description: This cheat sheet walks you through the steps to create a new Fuse Integration project using the Content-Based Router pattern.

item.title: Open the Fuse Integration Perspective
item.description: Select Window > Open Perspective > Fuse Integration in the menu bar at the top of the workbench. This step changes the perspective to set up the Eclipse workbench for development of your Apache Camel/JBoss Fuse routes.

item.title: Open the New Fuse Project wizard
item.description:
To create your new project you now need to open the New Integration Project wizard. You can do that by selecting File > New > Fuse Integration Project from the top menu bar.
Once it opened, you can specify the location your project should live in. On the next page, you can select a specific Runtime environment or choose a specific Camel version. On the last page, you can select from a list of available templates. Please select the template JBoss Fuse > Beginner > Content Based Router from the list.
Click on Finish to finally create your new project.
